Paragraph: In the motor activity test measured with an Animex - activity meter neither of the K ( + ) - channel blockers affected morphine - induced hypoactivity , but both K ( + ) - channel blockers prevented morphine - induced secondary hyperactivity .

Note: In this context, "hypoactivity" and "hyperactivity" are considered as conditions or effects of the morphine administration, and therefore are considered as diseases.
